info.title: Speaker Verification API
info.description:
This API is currently available in:

* West US - westus.api.cognitive.microsoft.com

Endpoint.description: Supported Cognitive Services endpoints (protocol and hostname, for example: https://westus.api.cognitive.microsoft.com).

localeParam.name: locale
localeParam.description: A combination of language code and country code.

Locale.description: Language identifier consisting of a combination of language code and country code.

EnrollmentStatus.description:
Status representing the current state of the profile. Available values are:
* Enrolling: profile has no voice print and not ready for recognition requests.
* Training: voice print of profile is being created and canâ€™t be used for recognition at the moment.
* Enrolled: profile has a voice print and ready for recognition requests.

LastUpdatedDateTime.description: Last datetime when the profile was updated.

EnrollmentsCount.description: Number of enrolment audios accepted for this profile.

EnrollmentsLength.description: Total length of enrollment audios accepted for this profile in seconds.

EnrollmentsSpeechLength.description: Summation of pure speech (which is the amount of audio after removing silence and non-speech segments) across all profile enrollments in seconds.

RemainingEnrollmentsCount.description: Number of enrollment audios needed to complete profile enrollment.

RemainingEnrollmentsSpeechLength.description: Amount of pure speech (which is the amount of audio after removing silence and non-speech segments) needed to complete profile enrollment in seconds.

ModelVersion.description: Date specifying the model assigned to this profile. Format is yyyy-mm-dd. If profile has no enrollments, this value will be empty.

post.description:
Resets existing profile to its original creation state. The reset operation does the following:
* Updates enrollmentStatus to Enrolling.
* Updates lastUpdatedDateTime.
* Updates enrollmentsCount to 0.
* Updates enrollmentsLength to 0.
* Updates enrollmentsSpeechLength to 0.
* Updates remainingEnrollmentsCount to the initial required number.
* Removes all associated enrollments from storage.
* Removes chosen passphrase association.
* Resets value of modelVersion.

Adds an enrollment to existing profile.
If the minimum number of requested enrollment audios is reached, a voice print is created.
If the voice print was created before, it gets recreated from all existing enrollment audios including the new one.

Limitations:
* Minimum audio input length per request is **1 second**
* Maximum audio input length per request is **10 seconds**
* Minimum number of enrollments for creating a voiceprint is **3**
* Maximum number of enrollments for creating a voiceprint is **50**
* Minimum audio Signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) is **10dB**

Constraints:
* First enrollment must match an existing passphrase.
* All enrollments after the first one, must use the same passphrase used in the first enrollment.

parameters.name: audioData
parameters.description: Binary audio file. Supported formats are audio/wav; codecs=audio/pcm. Supports audio up to 5MB.

400.description:
Bad Request
* InvalidRequest - Invalid audio length. Maximum allowed length is 10 seconds.
* InvalidRequest - Invalid audio length. Minimum allowed length is 1 second.
* InvalidRequest - Invalid audio format. Supported format is WAV 16Khz 16bit Mono PCM.
* InvalidRequest - Invalid passphrase.
* InvalidRequest - Audio is too noisy. The minimum allowed Signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) is 10dB.

error.message: Audio is too noisy.

post.description:
Resets existing profile to its original creation state. The reset operation does the following:
* Updates enrollmentStatus to Enrolling.
* Updates lastUpdatedDateTime.
* Updates enrollmentsCount to 0.
* Updates enrollmentsLength to 0.
* Updates enrollmentsSpeechLength to 0.
* Updates remainingEnrollmentsSpeechLength to the required number.
* Removes all associated enrollments from storage.
* Removes chosen passphrase association.
* Resets value of modelVersion.

Adds enrollments to existing profile.
If the minimum number of requested enrollment audios is reached, a voice print is created.
If the voice print was created before, it gets recreated from all existing enrollment including the new one.

Limitations:
* Minimum audio input length per request is **1 second**
* Maximum audio input length per request is **120 seconds**
* Minimum total effective speech length (excluding silence and other non-speech frames) for creating a voiceprint is **20 seconds**
  This limitation can be disabled by setting "ignoreMinLength" to **true**.

* Maximum total audio input length allowed for creating a voiceprint is **300 seconds**
* Minimum audio Signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) is **0dB**

parameters.name: ignoreMinLength
parameters.description: If true, a voice print will be created immediately for this profile regardless of how much speech is supplied or stored. Default is false.

parameters.name: audioData
parameters.description: Binary audio file. Supported formats are audio/wav; codecs=audio/pcm. Supports audio up to 5MB.

* InvalidArgument - Invalid ignoreMinLength parameter value. Valid values are "true" and "false".
